statements: SELECT * FROM personal_finance_metrics;
SELECT income, savings FROM personal_finance_metrics WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, expenses FROM personal_finance_metrics ORDER BY expenses DESC;
SELECT user_id, income, expenses, savings FROM personal_finance_metrics WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT * FROM personal_finance_metrics WHERE income > expenses AND savings > 0;
SELECT * FROM personal_finance_metrics ORDER BY income DESC, expenses ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, savings FROM personal_finance_metrics WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT user_id, income, expenses FROM personal_finance_metrics WHERE savings > 5000 AND (income BETWEEN 50000 AND 80000);
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM personal_finance_metrics WHERE credit_score < 600;
SELECT AVG(savings) AS average_savings FROM personal_finance_metrics WHERE income > expenses;
SELECT * FROM personal_finance_metrics;
SELECT user_id, income, expenses, savings FROM personal_finance_metrics;
SELECT user_id, income FROM personal_finance_metrics WHERE expenses > 500;
SELECT user_id, expenses FROM personal_finance_metrics WHERE income < 3000;
SELECT user_id, (income - expenses) AS net_income FROM personal_finance_metrics;
SELECT * FROM personal_finance_metrics WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, income, expenses FROM personal_finance_metrics WHERE expenses > income;
SELECT income, expenses, savings FROM personal_finance_metrics WHERE savings >= 1000 ORDER BY expenses DESC;
SELECT user_id, income FROM personal_finance_metrics WHERE income BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY income ASC;
SELECT AVG(income) AS avg_income, AVG(expenses) AS avg_expenses FROM personal_finance_metrics;
SELECT * FROM personal_finance_metrics;
SELECT user_id, metric_name, metric_value FROM personal_finance_metrics WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM financial_sources;
SELECT source_name, value FROM financial_sources JOIN financial_data ON financial_sources.source_id = financial_data.source_id;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM personal_finance_metrics ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM personal_finance_metrics WHERE metric_name='Savings';
SELECT user_id, source_name FROM financial_sources WHERE user_id=100 ORDER BY source_name DESC;
SELECT source_name, value FROM financial_data WHERE date >= '2021-01-01' AND date <= '2021-12-31' ORDER BY value DESC, date ASC;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM personal_finance_metrics WHERE metric_value > 1000 AND metric_name LIKE '%Income%';

SELECT fd.date, fs.source_name, pfm.metric_name FROM financial_data fd JOIN financial_sources fs ON fd.source_id = fs.source_id JOIN personal_finance_metrics pfm ON fd.metric_id = pfm.id WHERE fs.source_type='Salary' AND pfm.metric_value > 50000 ORDER BY fd.date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, account_balance FROM users WHERE account_balance > 500;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, category FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, budget_amount, category FROM budgets WHERE category = 'Groceries';
SELECT goal_name, goal_amount, target_date FROM goals WHERE goal_amount > 1000 ORDER BY target_date;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, account_balance FROM users WHERE account_balance > 1000 ORDER BY account_balance ASC;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.transaction_date, t.transaction_amount, u.username FROM transactions t JOIN users u ON t.user_id = u.user_id WHERE t.transaction_amount < 0;
SELECT g.goal_id, g.goal_name, g.goal_amount, u.username FROM goals g JOIN users u ON g.user_id = u.user_id WHERE g.target_date > NOW();
SELECT * FROM PersonalFinanceMetrics ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT income, expenses, savings FROM PersonalFinanceMetrics WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT category_name, budget_amount FROM BudgetingCategories ORDER BY budget_amount DESC;
SELECT amount, transaction_type FROM BankTransactions WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
SELECT user_id, vendor FROM CreditCardTransactions WHERE amount > 500;
SELECT user_id, date, income, expenses, savings FROM PersonalFinanceMetrics WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM BankTransactions WHERE user_id = 2 AND transaction_id > 100 ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT transaction_id, date, amount, vendor FROM CreditCardTransactions WHERE amount < 0 AND vendor = 'Amazon' ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT user_id, date, SUM(amount) AS total_investment FROM InvestmentPortfolio WHERE investment_type = 'Stocks' GROUP BY user_id
SELECT category_name, budget_amount FROM BudgetingCategories WHERE budget_amount > 500 ORDER BY category_name
